Author: fsamsa
Text: Hi thanks for replying, They dont ship to my country sadly but anyway i ll see if i can maybe find something of the likes Sounds good though. Thank you!!

Author: lasirenexx
Text: Flavored green tea tends to still be too bitter, so I’d go with a flavored zero-cal sweetener instead! I really like to add [Jordan’s Skinny Syrup](https://www.skinnymixes.com/collections/skinny-syrups) to green or rose tea... Birthday Cake, Salted Caramel, and Blueberry Lavender all pair really well with tea IMO.
